text: so this is the mantis hexapod walking
machine as a six-legged walking machine

the software on board here was developed

when the scale got up and the mass went

as I called it got completely

and that's called the hex engine and
that is the core of the control system
the hex engine basically does all of the

and all that stuff and it talks to six

they're all set on the can bus so the
